Option Name: # Perimeter Insulation Nominal R-Value: Nominal R-value of the vertical slab perimeter insulation.
# Perimeter Insulation Depth: Depth from grade to bottom of vertical slab perimeter insulation.
# Under Slab Insulation Nominal R-Value: Nominal R-value of the horizontal under slab insulation.
# Under Slab Insulation Width: Width from slab edge inward of horizontal under-slab insulation. Use 999 to specify that the under slab insulation spans the entire slab.
# Thickness: The thickness of the slab. Zero can be entered if there is a dirt floor instead of a slab.
